content.question: Dr. Kebede read through all of the journal responses submitted by the participants in both groups and concluded that expressing gratitude does indeed increase subjective well-being. Which of the following cognitive biases is most likely to affect Dr. Kebedeâ€™s interpretation of the journals?

skill.text: 1.B: Explain how cultural norms, expectations, and circumstances, as well as cognitive biases apply to behavior and mental processes.
